mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_TYPE , TEL1 , TEL2 , MEMBER_ADDR FROM SHOPPING_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{memberPassword}
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BUY_DATE FROM SHOPPING_BUY WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC

SELECT B.ORDER_NUM , G.GOODS_NAME , I.FILE_NAME , G.GOODS_PRICE , B.ORDER_GOODS_CNT , B.ORDER_PRICE FROM SHOPPING_BUY B, SHOPPING_IMAGE I, SHOPPING_GOODS G WHERE B.GOODS_ID = I.GOODS_ID AND B.GOODS_ID = G.GOODS_ID AND TO_CHAR(B.BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{buyDate} AND B.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND IMAGE_ID LIKE '%1' ORDER BY GOODS_NAME
